amendment.description: Amendment expresses the sense of Congress that the Secretary of Defense and Chairman of the Joint Chiefs of Staff should revise the priority for counter drug activity, making it second only to war-fighting.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 and printed in the Congressional Record to express the sense of Congress and establish findings that the Secretary of Defense and Chairman of the Joint Chiefs of Staff should revise the priority for counter-drug activity, making it second only to war-fighting.

action.text: On agreeing to the McCollum amendment (A001) Agreed to by recorded vote: 362 - 61 (Roll No. 438).
